examples module¶

examples module API:

  • eg_hierarchy

Example usage:

from pytaxa import examples
examples.eg_hierarchy("poa")
examples.eg_hierarchy("puma")
examples.eg_hierarchy("salmo")

examples API¶

examples.eg_hierarchy()¶

Hierarchy example objects

Usage:

from pytaxa import examples
examples.eg_hierarchy("poa")
examples.eg_hierarchy("puma")
examples.eg_hierarchy("salmo")
